body.name: IMBZBK 3 Pack Privacy Screen Protector for Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra Tempered Glass 3 Pack Camera Lens Protector Accessories Anti Spy Case Friendly, Support Fingerprint Reader, Full Coverage
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 16 hrs 32 mins
features: True 25° Privacy Protection: Most privacy protector on the market only gives 30° viewing, IMBZBK's Privacy Coatings made of new materials from Germany with Microlourver Optical Technology, It offers optimum 25° degree peep (Smaller viewing angles mean stronger privacy protection). The screen is only visible to persons directly in front of the screen, maximum protection for your privacy & sensitive information, even your friends or colleagues sitting next to you also can't see on your messages.

Full Covers & Strongest Protection: IMBZBK's tempered glass envelops the screen's every curve with a reinforced 1:1 3D curved black edge, can covers the curved edges of the Samsung S24 Ultra, provide maximum protection. IMBZBK's screen protector made with Aerospace-Grade glass and fuses Nano-Ceramics into the screen protector (Awarded SGS Certification), providing 10X stronger protection than normal glass for superior resistance to damage caused by scratches, bumps, and drops in daily use.

Frontal Ultra HD & Original Touch: IMBZBK's privacy protector break through the defects of the blurred picture of the privacy glass films on the market, highly restore the best visual feast brought by the screen. Even more special...Our 0.28mm ultra-thin privacy glass innovatively applied a 9th gen oleophobic nano coating (top-notch skin-friendly), effectively reduces fingerprints, oil residue by 98% to make it smoother than the original screen!

Support Fingerprint Reader & Camera Protector: IMBZBK' privacy screen protector uses the latest German Die-Cutting technology for a seamless fit. Perfectly suitable with fingerprint unlocking. IMBZBK's camera lens protector made of 9H glass to effectively protect the lens from scratches, drops and daily damage. Anti-fingerprint coating to keep it clean, light transmittance of 99.99%, Suitable with night shooting function, these features allow you keep phone photos original all the time.

Case Friendly & Easy Installation: We care about every detail, IMBZBK's privacy glass and camera protector is precisely cut by laser. Ensures that covering the visible screen, while retaining a reasonable amount of space around the black edge. As a result, they are Suitable with most phone cases. Provides installation guidance frame, without worrying about aligning the screen. Even if you are an inexperienced user, it can be installed very easily.

Cost-effective & Enthusiastic Customer Service: Committed to providing One-Stop purchase experience, no need spend more on other accessories. The IMBZBK bundle includes: [3*Privacy Screen Protector] [3*Camera Lens Protector] [1*Installation Guidance Frame] [3*Screen Cleaning Kits]. If you encounter any problems, you can send the information to us through the Amazon Message Center, we will provide you with Satisfactory Service within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and customer service
reviews.reviewText: This product is great works just like it says. The finger print on the screen gives me problems even with he solution they provided, however I feel this is a bad design by Samsung because all the phones I have had with the print on the screen have given me issues. The glass was easy to install on my screen, it does have the privacy look at the 20 degree angle. Customer service is great for this product they sent me information before my glass arrived to verify I had the correct phone and didn’t make a mistake, they also told me how to deal with the print issue by adjusting my settings.Again great product and great customer service I would definitely buy this product again from this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Screen sensitivity impacted: stylus doesn't work, fingerprint troubles
reviews.reviewText: The S24 Ultra stylus was the reason I got this phone, but unfortunately does not work with this screen protector. It comes and goes, so attempting to draw a line will result in dashes, and cropping a selection on screen will mean stopping the marquee too soon, and being unable to accurately select a rectangle of the desired dimensions.The privacy part is good, good brightness remains, but unfortunately the screen sensitivity issues make this unusable.Most of the reviews mention fingerprint sensitivity which did go down as expected, but it was bearable after increasing the sensitivity setting and adding my fingerprints again after installing the protector.My last issue is with the vendor: they spammed me a "support message" before I even got the item, with a disclaimer clarifying what I had purchased and that if it was the wrong item I should go through them to replace it. It seemed sneaky and unnecessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's an easy application screen protector that fits fine with a case. No problem with bubbles or dust when applying. Privacy screen is great. The down side is the fingerprint biometrics are a bit hit or miss even after re-registering my fingerprints with the screen protector on. And idk if it's just me, but the protector somehow makes the screen look a bit darker than usual and slightly blurry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best
reviews.reviewText: I have been putting on screen protectors since I worked in the cellular industry so for over 20 years. This was the easiest one to install because they give you a guide to put on the phone. There is no way that you can mess this up. Yes the fingerprint sensor could be better but they tell you in the instructions that you need to re-record your fingerprint after the screen protector is on so this cuts down on a lot of misreads. People are probably not following the instructions. For the money, one of the best

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great, easy to apply
reviews.reviewText: Loved the kit to apply it correctly. Unfortunately the touch screen capabilities are diminished some with this screen protector and it frequently takes several attempts to log in with fingerprint.Update I have had this on less than 2 weeks and it has several cracks in it. I have not dropped my phone and never cracked a screen protector before so I'm not quite sure what's going on

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easiest to install ever
reviews.reviewText: The packaging and instructions are perfect. It comes with everything needed packaged for each set of protectors. It comes with a guide or template that snaps onto the phone and makes placing the screen protector perfect the first time so easy. No bubbles, no weird light spots and it feels pretty durable. This is just a great product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good and bad
reviews.reviewText: The screen protector I purchased approximately two weeks ago has already developed a crack. While the installation process was straightforward, the product did not meet my expectations in several areas. Despite claims of being bubble-free, multiple bubbles were present upon application on a brand-new Galaxy S24 Ultra. Additionally, the placement of the word "glass" on the side that adheres to the phone is visible under certain lighting conditions, which is aesthetically unappealing. Furthermore, the screen protector does not effectively conceal the screen's contents, making it less effective in terms of privacy. In comparison, the Galaxy S23 Ultra screen protector offered superior performance in these aspects.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well Worth The Money
reviews.reviewText: Great product. It's easy to install (I think this is the first screen protector I installed that I didn't have to fight with the bubbles under the screen).Even though I set my fingerprint with the screen protector on, it usually takes 2 - 3 tries to unlock the phone. This may be user error, but it was so annoying that I turned off the fingerprint scan to open my phone.The privacy protection function works really well. It isn't so sensitive that it's hard to play games on your phone, but it does help with prying eyes from others around you.Highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great privacy screen protector and such value for money. You get 3 screen protectors and 3 camera lense protectors and so easy to apply.
Vraiment top. Pour une fois pas déçu par le verre trempé, très bonne qualité et l'empreinte fonctionne. Je suis content de mon achat

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks good Fits wel. Easy to apply, pleased with my buy
Bonjours rien à redire personne j'en suis satisfaite comparé à mon mari qui adhérer pas du tous bref je recommande se produit ,bonne soirée.

reviews.reviewTitle: Hülle und Linsenschutz Samsung S24 Ultra
reviews.reviewText: Sehr schöne und griffige Hülle. Das glas ist auch gut und muus sich noch beweisen.
